section_1.title: Current Competencies
section_1.description: Shows competencies the user currently has
section_1.purpose: Display user's existing skills and proficiency levels

section_2.title: Skills Needed for Career Path
section_2.description: Lists skills they need to achieve the career path that the company has set for them
section_2.purpose: Show gap analysis and learning requirements

user_flows.name: User Login to Dashboard
user_flows.description: When a user logs in, they are redirected to their Competency & Skills Dashboard
steps: Dashboard displays current progress, verified skills, and remaining gaps

user_flows.name: Competency Card Interaction
user_flows.description: User interacts with competency cards to view detailed information
steps: Card expands to show detailed breakdown (verified vs missing micro/nano skills)
Skill details modal opens showing proficiency history, last verification date, and source

user_flows.name: Missing Skills Management
user_flows.description: User views and manages missing skills for career development
steps: Suggestion modal opens with recommended courses and learning paths
User can mark skill as 'In Progress'

user_flows.name: Real-Time Updates
user_flows.description: Dashboard updates automatically when assessment results arrive
steps: Assessment result arrives from Assessment Service
Progress bars and skill indicators refresh
